tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SponsorshipDetails (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  contract_start_date DATE,
  contract_end_date DATE,
  sponsorship_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  agreement TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE contracts_and_agreements (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsor_id INT,
    contract_date DATE,
    contract_type VARCHAR(50),
    agreement_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SponsorshipDetails (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sponsor_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Contracts (
  contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sponsor_id UUID,
  contract_date DATE,
  contract_details TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_sponsor FOREIGN KEY (sponsor_id) REFERENCES SponsorshipDetails(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Agreements (
  agreement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  contract_id UUID,
  agreement_date DATE,
  agreement_details TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_contract FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES Contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sponsorship_details (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    sponsor_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES sponsorship_details(id)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_details (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);
